title: Apply a Contractual Adjustment
description: A biller is manually posting a payment and needs to apply the correct contractual adjustment based on the payer's allowed amount.

tasks.description: Identify the claim, the total charges, and the allowed amount from the explanation of benefits (EOB).
tasks.expected_outcome: Biller has all the necessary financial figures.

tasks.description: Calculate the contractual adjustment amount (Total Charges - Allowed Amount).
tasks.expected_outcome: Biller correctly calculates the amount that needs to be written off.

tasks.description: Post the payment and the contractual adjustment to the claim.
tasks.expected_outcome: The payment is posted, the adjustment is applied, and the remaining balance is correctly identified.
